name: Pete Canavan
offering: Business Consulting, Podcast Host, Public Speaking, Website Design, Website Hosting
what_you_do: Cyber and physical security speaker and consultant who helps businesses develop plans to recover from cyberattacks and improve workplace safety.
who_you_serve: CEOs, business owners, and entrepreneurs, as well as companies, organizations, associations, and schools.
social_proof: Over 30 years of experience in Information Technology, in business since 1995, martial arts Master.
business_focus: Helping businesses stay safe and recover from cyberattacks through speaking, consulting, and custom security blueprints.
service_provided: Cyber security consulting, physical security consulting, keynote speaking, risk assessment, threat analysis, ongoing training
